channel.title: Need help with... something?

item.title: Need help with... something?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I already said that just came up with more errors. Here are the errors.

client.java:18874: playerHasItem(int) in client cannot be applied to (int, int) if (playerHasItem(2384, 15000)) { ^ client.java:18875: deleteItem(int,int,int) in client cannot be applied to (int,int) deleteItem(2384, 15000); ^

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with... something?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if (useItemID == 2384 && atObjectID == 2314) { // Blue Partyhat if (playerHasItem(2384, 15000)) { deleteItem(2384, 15000); addItem(1024, 1); sendMessage("You received a blue partyhat!"); } else { sendMessage("You need 15000 fingernails to get this item!"); } }
Sorry for the conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with... something?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I keep getting the same error.

client.java:8511: ')' expected if (playerHasItem(2384, 15000) { ^

I try to put the ) after
if (playerHasItem(2384, 15000)
but it only gives me more errors. Any idea why this is happening?

item.title: Need help with... something?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I just removed the fingernail shop in ChassyScape to fix the shop glitch, and now I need to have a different source of getting partyhats.
I made 8 different chests and want them to require a certain amount of fingernails to use.
Heres my current code, I just have no idea how to make it so that you require 15000 fingernails to use the chest.

[code=cpp] } else if (useItemID == 2384 && atObjectID

== 2314) // Blue Partyhat
{
deleteItem(2384, getItemSlot(2384), 1);
addItem(1024, 1);
sendMessage(“You received a blue partyhat!”);[/code]

If you could help me out, I would really appreciate it.

Read full topic
